overview:
Joshua is a Certified Scrum Master and Certified Java Programmer that currently enjoying life in Australia with his lovely wife.

He has broad experiences in mission critical Enterprise web app development projects for high-profile companies. He is a lean and agile process freak. He constantly contemplates and find ways to improve and simplify product development process. He’s currently serving as a part-time Agile Coach to help organizations improve their process and maximize the product’s ROI.

These days, besides Enterprise Java you will also find him enjoying lightweight webapp development with Ruby on Rails and Python. He loves opensource projects and constantly contributes to opensource projects whenever possible.
